about_me.des: I am M.Sc. in Electrical Engineering and IT and a Technical Lead.

projects.pdc: Integration of VOIP services and metadata in various CRM systems. (Click2Call, Real-Time Call Info Display, Call Logging).
projects.hls: Real-time Audio processing / HLS Streaming Server fully developed with Bash and streamed by Nginx.
projects.cc: C Compiler developed with Java programming language and JavaCC Parser Generator. Developed own parser with help of JavaCC. The compilerâ€™s output is assembly code for a dependable processor with an original instruction set developed by IHP Institute for High Performance Microelectronics in Frankfurt (Oder).
projects.esa: Web Application for reporting disasters around the World. Customer decided to use Liferay CMS for adding and managing content. I developed additional customer-specific customizations regarding the workflow of reporting a disaster, developed specific views using Liferay Portlets.
projects.apc: System for initiating gate opening depending on proximity to location. The system consists of Android application and Server managing location entries and call points.
projects.rte: A system that unifies event reporting to Police, Fire Departments and First Aid Medical departments. The system consists of Android application for Reporting real-time events (accidents, thefts, fires, medical emergencies, etc...) and Server for receiving and managing the events.
projects.sunb: Android application for Remote control of electric devices over Bluetooth Low Energy protocol. The off-grid system is powered by a battery charged by Sun collectors.
projects.ubs: Web Application - Calculator and Financial Advisor for (but not limited to) mortgages, performing complex calculations.
projects.wht: Web Application - Calculator for calculating withold tax of different types of transactions in different countries.
projects.tie: Web Application for organizing and sharing hospital data for patients between different hospitals.
projects.tt: Web Application for Entering and tracking time for all employees with Reporting Mechanisms for time spent by person/project.
projects.pog: JavaFx Desktop Application for easy tagging and searching of photos inside your computer. Includes face recognition algorithm.
projects.ldap: Web API for managing LDAP users (add user, change user group, change password).
projects.rlb: Android application for remote control of temperature, mode of work, fan speed and additional parameters over Wi-Fi.
projects.conf: Web Application based on Atlassian Confluence which includes a lot of customizations intended to meet company needs. It included plugins for managing and showing content, conference room planner, employee data organizer, etc.
projects.hwsw2010: The system provides 3D path mapping. Involves a robot sending data via Bluetooth to PC, which draws the robot's real-time 3D path.
projects.hwsw2011: Realization of a system for autonomous research of unknown terrain, akin to the Mars Rover. The system was comprised of an RP6 robot, RFID reader, GPRS modem, gyroscope, dsPIC microcontroller and a Personal Computer.

career.sentice_desc: I started working as one of the first employees in Sentice Tech LLC, where besides leading several projects in several technologies, I am also involved in the setup and maintenance of all internal network and system architecture of the company.
career.sentice_job: Senior Software Developer, Technical Lead & Sys Admin
career.netcetera_desc: I started my professional programming career at Netcetera AG in Skopje, where I was involved in several Java EE projects using various Java techonlogies, some of which: Spring, Hibernate, JDBC, Servlets, JSP, Struts, etc. Gained valuable knowledge.
career.feit: Faculty of Electrical Engineering and IT, UKIM, Skopje
career.feit_msc_desc: Continued my studies involving several subjects from the fields of SoC and Nanoelectronics. Developed a C compiler for Dependable processor as a part of M.Sc. Thesis.
career.feit_ta_desc: Assisted students in finishing laboratory tasks. Worked with PIC16F877a microcontroller. Subject: Mictoelectronics.
career.feit_bsc_desc: Received solid science and engineering knowledge base. Participated in few competitions for the Faculty, one of which "Hardware & Software" international competition in 2011 when our team won the first prize.
